text: yaqinan tumhaare liye ibrath ki nishaani thi un do jamaato mein jo ghath4 gayi thi, ek jamaath to Allah ta’ala ki raah mein lad rahi thi aur dosra gruh kaafiro ka tha, wo unhe apni aankho se apne se dogna kar ke dekhte thein aur Allah ta’ala jise chaahe apni madad se qawi5 karta hai, yaqinan us mein aankho waalo ke liye badi ibrath hai
